Package com.diogonunes.jcolor

package com.diogonunes.jcolor
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Ansi
    Provides a fluent API to generate ANSI escape sequences by specifying Attributes of your format.
    AnsiFormat
    Abstracts an Array of Attributes.
    Attribute
    Abstracts ANSI codes with intuitive names.
